item.title: Daniel add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Ramsey Lewis
item.description: "when one becomes successful, send th eelevator back down for some one else" -- Ramsey Lewis

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I'm the one that's got to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life the way I want to." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens" -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again" -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Excuse me while I kiss the sky." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Music is a safe kind of high." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "You have to go on and be crazy. Craziness is like heaven. " -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Butterflies and zebras And moonbeams and fairy tales That's all she ever thinks about Riding with the wind." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "All I'm gonna do is just go on and do what I feel." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I've been imitated so well I've heard people copy my mistakes." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "I used to live in a room full of mirrors; all I could see was me. I take my spirit and I crash my mirrors, now the whole world is here for me to see." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Live to the point of tears." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You know what charm is: a way of getting the answer yes without having asked any clear question." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Blessed are the hearts that can bend; they shall never be broken." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "There are causes worth dying for, but none worth killing for." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "At the heart of all beauty lies something inhuman." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "When the soul suffers too much, it develops a taste for misfortune." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You can't create experience, you undergo it." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "It is the job of thinking people not to be on the side of the executioners." -- Albert Camus
